title: Influencer Marketing in Esports
description: Influencer Marketing is a hot topic in 2020. But how can a brand know if influencer marketing is the right fit for them? EyePromise found the secret formula.

title: EyePromise.gg
description: EyePromise.gg is a new iteration of the ScreenShield.gg beta project. The original project was done by ZackEaton.com and taken to EyePromise.

title: OV Photography
description: The client needed a custom web application to keep track of client information, photoshoot details, invoice statuses, as well as pre and post-event tasks.

title: Building A Brand For Esports On Social Media
description: With some small rebranding, EyePromise saw tremendous growth organically. Using affiliate marketing EyePromise quickly became a well-known brand in esports.

title: NPS Campaigns
description: Multiple NPS campaigns with surveys sent to customers. Data was fed between the client's website, the NPS application, and the client's CRM.
